We are Aganitha, your Computational Twin.

Aganitha (अगणित) “countless” or “limitless” in Sanskrit serves as a reminder and inspiration about the limitless potential in each one of us, and how Artificial Intelligence (AI) expands that potential infinitely further.

Our
Mission: Accelerate drug discovery and development by applying the power of Data, Cloud, Analytics and AI/ML for in silico based solutions.

At Aganitha, we partner with global bio pharma companies to complement the traditional lab based approaches with in silico approaches and solutions to research and development.

We adopt multi-disciplinary approaches blending and translating the latest knowledge in Biology, Chemistry, BioPharma and Computing areas.

We are investing in industry and academic coalitions to continuously expand the diversity of the talent we hire, and the range of solutions Aganitha provides to its customers.

We care deeply about our values, they are fundamental to the success of our organisation.

Inclusive and open minded

Open to champion and support different perspectives. We help create an inclusive and empowering environment within the team.

Mentorship and growth

Nudge in the right direction to encourage learning and ideation Encourage ownership mentality and creative outloo

Valuable Provider

Positive and collaborative customer experience Be an equal footing partner to augment customer needs

Focus and excellence

Perform our best together as a team and walk the extra mile Focus on what matters the most, what and how to do it to achieve desired outcome

Quality and consistency

Embibe quality as paramount and remains uncompromised Bring new solutions and platforms, and deliver value to stakeholders consistently

Trust and Reliability

Maintain complete transparency internally and externally Fulfil the commitments and win unwavering trust

Why do we care?

Discovery and development of drugs today is dramatically different from even a decade ago. Available innovation paths have rapidly expanded from small molecules, natural and recombinant biologicals to targeted cell, gene and advanced therapies that use viral and non-viral nano technologies as delivery vectors. The mechanisms of action are increasingly diverse with explosive innovation driving them. Most of the research has also progressed from single drugs to platform solutions.

Most importantly, today’s research and development processes require a strong cross-disciplinary approach, spanning Chemistry, Biology and advanced Computation. These fields are being transformed by the rapid progress in informatics, data and AI/Machine learning. The current global pandemic of COVID only highlights a problem known for a few years: there is a large unmet need for rapid development and manufacturing of medicines (preventives & cures) for new as well as long established diseases.

Would you like to be a part of the team?
